CustomField.description: Formula: Calculated "indicator" image name based on the priority and status of this Case. Used to display an indicator image on this case when shown in the user interface.
CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Priority)=='High' && TEXT(Status)!= 'Closed', 'highpriorityopen', (IF(TEXT(Priority)=='High' && TEXT(Status)=='Closed', 'highpriorityclose', (IF(TEXT(Priority)=='Medium' && TEXT(Status)!= 'Closed', 'mediumpriorityopen', (IF(TEXT(Priority)=='Medium' && TEXT(Status) == 'Closed', 'mediumpriorityclose', (IF(TEXT(Priority)=='Low' && TEXT(Status)!='Closed', 'lowpriorityopen', IF(TEXT(Priority)=='Low' && TEXT(Status) =='Closed', 'lowpriorityclose','' ))) )))))))
CustomField.label: Indicator Image Name
